p.a: Click Here to Enroll Today! OneApp Code #201

div.p: "Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort." -Paul J. Meyer
"The time is always right to do what is right." -Martin Luther King Jr.
"Integrity is choosing your thoughts and actions based on values rather than personal gain." -Chris Karcher
"I respect myself and insist upon it from everybody. And because I do it, I then respect everybody too." -Maya Angelou
"We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit." -Aristotle

Edible Schoolyard New Orleans is a FirstLine signature program that changes the way children eat, learn, and live. As FirstLine Live Oak settles into its brand new facility, ESYNOLA is working to build gardens to support garden-based science and culinary classes.
FirstLine Live Oak is a member of the New Orleans Charter School Athletic Association. FirstLine Live Oak scholars will have the opportunity to participate in a variety of sports.
FirstLine Live Oak offers scholars afterschool clubs that offer a variety of experiences.
All scholars will have the opportunity to go on fun learning excursions & participate in outdoor education field trips.

p.br:
Choose #201 on the OneApp
Pre K – 8th grade

div.p:
3128 Constance St | New Orleans, LA 70115
Phone: (504)-324-4207 | Fax: (504)-267-9058
Email Dione Singleton, School Director

300 N. Broad Street, Suite 207
New Orleans, LA 70119
